sentences.en: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course . -- Michelangelo .
sentences.cn: 自信是最好且最安全的 道路.

sentences.en: If no one ever took risks, Michelangelo have painted the Sistine floor.
sentences.cn: 要是人人都不冒险, 米开朗基罗只会在西斯汀教堂的地板上绘画.

sentences.en: In marmo Michelangelo ha scolpito molti capolavori artistici.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗用大理石塑造了许多艺术杰作.

sentences.en: Is this painting attributable to Michelangelo?
sentences.cn: 这幅画是米开朗琪罗画的 吗 ?

sentences.en: It took Michelangelo 4 years to paint the ceiling. He painted it while lying on his back.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗在天花板上作画花了4年时间, 且是用仰卧的姿势进行的。
米开朗琪罗在大理石上雕刻.

sentences.en: Michelangelo crafted the Statue of David from a single piece of marble.
sentences.cn: 米卡朗基罗从一整块大理石中雕刻出了大卫的雕像.

sentences.en: Michelangelo is considered to be one of the greatest artists in renaissance.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗被认为是文艺复兴时期最伟大的艺术家之一.

sentences.en: Michelangelo obtained his marble from a quarry.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗从采石场获得他的大理石.

sentences.en: Michelangelo was clearly in Raphael's thoughts at times.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗确实是拉斐尔脑海中常有的念想.

sentences.en: Michelangelo, while working, had to lie on his back and paint.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗, 而工作时, 曾趴在他的背部及油漆.

sentences.en: Michelangelo's David is just one of the artist's many masterpieces.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗的《大卫》雕像是他的许多杰作之一.

sentences.en: P > The drawing of Michelangelo were recently exhibited in New York.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗的素描最近在纽约展出.

sentences.en: Rodin climbing life, and finally to board another peak after Michelangelo.
sentences.cn: 罗丹一生攀登, 并终于登上米开朗基罗之后的又一高峰.

sentences.en: The Michelangelo masterpiece attracts more than 1.2 million people every year.
sentences.cn: 米开朗基罗的这个杰作每年吸引120多万游客.

sentences.en: You may become a Shakespeare, a Michelangelo, a Beethoven.
sentences.cn: 你可以成为莎士比亚, 米开朗琪罗, 或者是贝多芬.

trans.tran_cn: 米开朗基罗(1475-1564，意大利文艺复兴时期成就卓著的科学家，艺术家)
米开朗基罗（意大利文艺复兴雕刻家、画家、建筑师和诗人）
